alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:02AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS COUNTY THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 602 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout 7 miles southwest of Saint Augustine Shores, or 7 miles east of Hastings, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, Anastasia, and Dupont Center. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
